Articles.Content: I returned Jeb and Val from a mission, recovered the ship, but it still says they're assigned in the astronaut complex, how do I remove this problem?

34 minutes ago, Space Nerd said:

I returned Jeb and Val from a mission, recovered the ship, but it still says they're assigned in the astronaut complex, how do I remove this problem? 

Do you see anything in the Astronauts Tab at the Tracking Station?

I am curious in the Astronaut Complex what is the vessel it says they are assigned to?Is that vessel fully recovered?Maybe it broke in parts?

Go to your game main folder location->saves->Your Carreer Name->Saves->persistent.sfs

Make a backup first, copy it somewhere else.(Also the saves folder has all your carreer so you should always have this backuped)

Persistent.sfs it's a text file, so open it with your Notepad(or any text editor).

Control+F to do a search for ROSTER and then search for Jebediah Kerman and Valentina Kerman.(Dont Search their names first because they are all over the place).

All of your Kerbals are under ROSTER .

Change the state = Assigned to state = Available

I think it should fix it.Uhhh I hope it does, make a backup first .

If you have more energy after that you could also try Verifying Files if you are on Steam.(Library->Right Click Kerbal->Properties->Local Files)

 

Edited August 23, 2019 by Boyster

Redid the save fixed it, thanks!

The vessel is recovered in tracking station, but the kerbals are assigned in astronaut complex 

Edited August 23, 2019 by Space Nerd
